name: Sky Dasher - Reach Mars
description:
Play and immerse yourself in the world of Dashers and help them reach their destination: Mars 🪐.

Follow their journey through the Galaxy as they face enemies, obstacles and hard levels 🥵👽👽.

Several choices are available:
✨ Follow the same path as the Dashers ( ﾟ ヮ ﾟ)
✨ Play the infinite adventure and try to go as far as possible
✨ Relax while playing, without taking any damage

The game was created by two students in less than 15 days.

Our discord : https://discord.gg/BeEtBPQ
